ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 249
ygData.msgSnippet: Even though you cannot transfer any goodies with your character you can transfer skills - so why not sell all your goodies, invest the money in some expensive
ygData.messageBody:
Even though you cannot transfer any goodies with your character you
can transfer skills - so why not sell all your goodies, invest the
money in some expensive trade skill (jewel making and blacksmithing
come to mind). Once you have used up all your money boosting your
trade skill then you're ready to have your character moved.

Dandee, The Nameless

--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., "Jose Muela" <redspieder@h...> wrote:
> yes, its kinda expensive, its $50 per character, and the character
does not go with ANY items or coin, the only things that transfer
with you are skills, faction, and spells allready scribed
>
> if you wanna try it go to
https://store.station.sony.com/eq_char_moves/index.jsp that should be
the link to the form
>
